data.title: Northern Michigan University - Transfer Campus Visit Registration - NMU Admissions
data.meta_description: You are registering to visit Northern Michigan University in the Upper Peninsula of Michigan as a Transfer Student. We can't wait to meet you! Please let us know if you need any accommodations for your visit to NMU.
data.text:
You are registering to visit Northern Michigan University in the Upper Peninsula of Michigan as a Transfer Student. We can't wait to meet you!

Note: Fall semesters typically begin in August, Winter semesters begin in January, and Summer semesters begin in May.

When will you start at NMU?

Your Campus Visit

(not including yourself)

Visit Arrangements:

Please note: Some appointments may be set-up virtually due to some staff working remotely. We will communicate with you the format of these appointments prior to your visit. If you request an academic appointment, please allow at least two weeks for scheduling.

Will you need a visitor parking pass?

Please let us know if you need any accommodations for your visit to NMU.

NMU's Campus Visit Program Office does not schedule appointments with athletic coaches. To schedule an appointment with an athletic coach, please contact NMU Intercollegiate Athletics.

Please note: we will confirm the details of your visit by mail, phone or e-mail. Please allow up to two weeks processing time.
